writings.text: 上戸は毒を知らず下戸は薬を知らず

readings.text: じょうごはどくをしらずげこはくすりをしらず

furigana.writing: 上戸は毒を知らず下戸は薬を知らず
furigana.reading: じょうごはどくをしらずげこはくすりをしらず

glossary: drinkers drink too much (and harm themselves in the process), nondrinkers drink too little (and miss out on the medicinal benefits of alcohol)
